translation.en: [Afro's father] Wait here, son.
translation.ja: 待っていろ

translation.en: [Afro's father] It'll soon be over.
translation.ja: すぐに終わる

translation.en: [Justice] Remember me, No.1?
translation.ja: 久しぶりだな　ナンバー１

translation.en: I've been waiting a very long time for this.
translation.ja: この時を待っていた

translation.en: [Afro's father] I know.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: "No.1" But, it all ends here.
translation.ja: それも 今日で終わる

translation.en: [Justice] Come on, man.
translation.ja: どうした

translation.en: Gimme whatcha got.
translation.ja: その程度か？

translation.en: Finally… I've got the title of No.1 in my hand.
translation.ja: ついに“ナンバー１”の称号を 手に入れた

translation.en: [Justice] With this band across my forehead…
translation.ja: このハチマキを額に巻いて…

translation.en: I will rule this world as God himself.
translation.ja: 俺は神となり 世界を支配する

translation.en: [Justice] It's unfortunate that you had to see this, boy.
translation.ja: こんな場面を見るとは 不憫(ふびん)だな

translation.en: This moment will always haunt you.
translation.ja: この瞬間が呪縛となり—

translation.en: You will be consumed by hatred for me.
translation.ja: 俺への憎しみに蝕(むしば)まれる

translation.en: Challenge me when you're ready to duel a god.
translation.ja: 神と戦う自信がついたら いつでも来い

translation.en: [ronin] This is the end of the road…
translation.ja: 貴様も ここまでだ

translation.en: Afro Samurai!
translation.ja: アフロサムライ！

translation.en: We got 20 guys here all armed to the teeth, we got you surrounded.
translation.ja: こっちは20人 完全武装で完全包囲だ

translation.en: We never said we were gonna play fair.
translation.ja: 姑息(こそく)な手は お手の物でね

translation.en: I got no idea why, but some pretty rich folks wanna pay top dollar for that cloth.
translation.ja: その布切れのために 大金を出すって連中がいる

translation.en: Why don't you… give it up, kid.
translation.ja: おとなしく— よこしやがれ

translation.en: Everybody's a tough guy… Okay, have it your way.
translation.ja: そんなに死にたいか 好きにしろ

translation.en: Gear-up boys!
translation.ja: いくぞ！

translation.en: Look at this boys! Tough guy here's gonna take us out with only one hand on his sword.
translation.ja: 見ろよ　刀一本だけで 俺たちを倒す気らしい

translation.en: Cut him up!
translation.ja: 切り刻んでやれ！

translation.en: [assassin 1] What the fu… That's impossible!
translation.ja: バカな ウソだろ

translation.en: [assassin 2] You son of a…
translation.ja: こいつ！

translation.en: [assassin 3] Fucking fucker! I cut you! I cut you!
translation.ja: クソ野郎　ブッ殺す

translation.en: [ronin] I took this job because…
translation.ja: 貴様の伝説など—

translation.en: I thought you were just a legend.
translation.ja: 信じちゃいなかった

translation.en: Just a story… a story to scare little kids.
translation.ja: ガキを脅かすための 作り話だと

translation.en: But you're the real deal the Demon who dares to challenge God.
translation.ja: だが“神に挑む悪鬼”は 本当にいたんだな

translation.en: So what the hell do you want?
translation.ja: 何が望みだ

translation.en: Don't seem to me like you out to make this stinkin' world a better place.
translation.ja: 正義の味方ってツラには 見えないぜ

translation.en: Why you gotta kill all my men? Why you gotta kill me?
translation.ja: どうしたら ここまで 残酷になれるんだ 貴様は

translation.en: [Afro] Nothing personal, it's just revenge.
translation.ja: ただの復讐だ

translation.en: [Ninja-Ninja] Yo yo yo yo yo, Afro!
translation.ja: YO！ アフロ！

translation.en: [Ninja-Ninja] That was off the chain! Cold blooded! Damn, motherfucker!
translation.ja: たまげたぜ すげぇ殺しっぷりだな

translation.en: Excuse me for probing, but what you just did back there, was it absolutely necessary?
translation.ja: でもよ　いくら何でも あそこまでやるか？

translation.en: I'm beginning to wonder if you got any feeling for human life left in you at all.
translation.ja: お前に人の心ってのは あるわけ？

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey. If you don't stop diss'in me, I'm gonna stop followin' your brutal ass around.
translation.ja: あんまり俺を怒らせると ついてってやらねえぞ

translation.en: Then whose gonna watch your back?
translation.ja: それでもいいのか

translation.en: Anyway, I did check some monk-looking bald motherfucker in a tree chattin' on a celly while watchin' your killin' spree.
translation.ja: お前を見ている 妙な坊主がいたぞ

translation.en: Don't that bother you? Sure as hell bother me.
translation.ja: イヤな感じがしねえか？

translation.en: Yo! Yo!
translation.ja: YO！ 待てよ

translation.en: Hold up! Hold up!
translation.ja: 待てって

translation.en: Afro!
translation.ja: アフロ！

translation.en: Breaking news just in!
translation.ja: 大変だぞ

translation.en: Huh? What the…
translation.ja: 何だ

translation.en: [Kuro] Jeez…
translation.ja: 何だよ

translation.en: [Okiku] Easy kid. What's the problem?
translation.ja: 落ち着きなよ どうしたんだい？

translation.en: It's HIM! He's here! He's here!
translation.ja: あいつが来やがった

translation.en: [Juzo] What the hell are you talking about, punk?
translation.ja: あいつって誰の話だ

translation.en: [punk] Ain't no doubt about it, man. He…
translation.ja: 間違いない　あいつさ

translation.en: Here. Drink up.
translation.ja: 飲みなよ

translation.en: He had this Afro-hairdo… you know what I'm sayin'?
translation.ja: アフロヘアのサムライだよ

translation.en: With kind of a greenish tint to it if you looked real close.
translation.ja: よく見ると緑がかった髪だ

translation.en: And he was wearing this freakin' headband, with the No.2 stamped high across his freakin' forehead…
translation.ja: 額のハチマキには “二番”って書いてあった

translation.en: [Kihachi] Did you say Afro-hairdo? Greenish tint?
translation.ja: 緑がかったアフロヘア？

translation.en: [Kurou] The headband… With No.2 written across it?
translation.ja: “二番”のハチマキだと？

translation.en: [Juzo] Make no mistake…
translation.ja: 間違いねえ

translation.en: That's him, that's the No.2.
translation.ja: ナンバー２の あいつだ

translation.en: The AFRO SAMURAI.
translation.ja: アフロサムライ

translation.en: The Afro Samurai?
translation.ja: アフロサムライだと？

translation.en: The one who cut down the assassins of the western guild?
translation.ja: 西の刺客たちを 皆殺しにした奴か

translation.en: Th… The No.2 swordsman of the world?
translation.ja: 世界で二番目に強い 剣客のことか

translation.en: He's cold blooded! He killed the brothers of Asura in only five moves.
translation.ja: たった５回の剣さばきで アシュラ兄弟を倒した男だ

translation.en: So don't think twice about crossing swords with that guy…
translation.ja: 命が惜しけりゃ 手を出さねえことだ

translation.en: [Kihachi] What a bunch of sissies. Screw that, cowards!
translation.ja: 情けない腰抜けどもめ

translation.en: You guys just watch while take that No.2 headband.
translation.ja: 二番のハチマキは この俺様が いただく

translation.en: That's all bullshit! You assholes just watch! I'm gonna take him out!
translation.ja: 黙って見物してな 奴を倒すのは俺だ

translation.en: [patron 1] It's gonna be me!
translation.ja: 俺だ

translation.en: [patron 2] Let me take him baby! He's all mine.
translation.ja: ザコはスッこんでろ

translation.en: [patron 3] Naa, I'm gonna be the No.2!
translation.ja: 俺がナンバー２だ

translation.en: All y'all just shut up!
translation.ja: 黙れ！

translation.en: Cause while you talk and talk and talk, my spear will be splitting his head in half!
translation.ja: 俺様が この槍で 奴の脳天をカチ割ってやる

translation.en: Just like this.
translation.ja: こうしてな

translation.en: [patron] Wow! Hey, man!
translation.ja: よせよ

translation.en: Get that rusty piece of junk outta my face, man…
translation.ja: そのクズ鉄をどけな

translation.en: [Soshun] Ma'am…
translation.ja: 姐さん

translation.en: [Soshun] Why is everyone after this Afro Samurai?
translation.ja: なぜ そいつは 目の敵にされてるんだ？

translation.en: You don't know? You really must be from out-of-town. We got ourselves a legend around here.
translation.ja: あんた この土地の伝説を 知らないみたいね

translation.en: [Soshun] A legend?
translation.ja: 伝説？

translation.en: [Okiku] Look. Two ancient headbands. No.1 and No.2.
translation.ja: 古代から伝わるハチマキが２本 “一番”と“二番”よ

translation.en: If you have the No.1, you're like a god. NOBODY can touch you…
translation.ja: 一番を持つ者(ナンバー１)は神 誰も手を出せない

translation.en: Except he who wears… No.2.
translation.ja: でも二番を持つ者(ナンバー２)だけは 挑むことができる

translation.en: The trouble with THAT is―
translation.ja: ただし…

translation.en: The trouble with THAT is,
translation.ja: ナンバー２には—

translation.en: that anyone in the world can challenge you.
translation.ja: 誰でも挑めるというわけか

translation.en: Clever boy. You're interested?
translation.ja: 鋭いね　興味あるの？

translation.en: The life of No.2: constant combat.
translation.ja: ナンバー２は毎日が死闘

translation.en: But ultimately, the path a warrior should take and the reward is to become a god.
translation.ja: だが それに耐えてこそ 神の地位を手にできる

translation.en: Yep. They say the No.1 waits at the top of Mt. Shumi.
translation.ja: ナンバー１は 須弥山(しゅみせん)の上にいるわ

translation.en: You can't miss it. It's got like 2 huge hand like things…
translation.ja: ２つの手が 生えたような形の山よ

translation.en: [giant] Get outta my way!
translation.ja: 邪魔すんな

translation.en: [Kihachi] Take it easy, Mac!
translation.ja: ちょっと待てよ

translation.en: You ain't the only one here who thinks he can take him.
translation.ja: てめえにハチマキは渡さねえ

translation.en: [Kihachi] Aghhhhhh! You caved my eyes in!
translation.ja: 目玉がメリ込んだ！

translation.en: [Juzo] Fucking son of a bitch! You warmed up yet?
translation.ja: ウォーミングアップは 済んだか？

translation.en: Hey hey, you wanna fight? Take it outside!
translation.ja: ケンカは外でやりな！

translation.en: [Afro] Lemonade… ice cold.
translation.ja: レモネード　冷やで

translation.en: [Okiku] Coming right up. 250 please.
translation.ja: ただいま　250よ

translation.en: Lemonade… Heh, heh, heh…
translation.ja: レモネードだってよ

translation.en: [Juzo] Hey man, shut the hell up!
translation.ja: 黙ってろ

translation.en: [giant] Now look who we got ourselves here.
translation.ja: おい おめえら見てみろや

translation.en: [Okiku] Here you are… lemonade.
translation.ja: はい レモネードね

translation.en: Drink that, boy. He he he…
translation.ja: 飲んでみろ　若造

translation.en: Uh, another one?
translation.ja: もう１杯？

translation.en: …on his tab?
translation.ja: 彼のツケで？

translation.en: [punk] Holy…
translation.ja: まさか…

translation.en: [Okiku] Here you are… lemonade.
translation.ja: どうぞ　レモネード

translation.en: That's gonna cost you more than 250.
translation.ja: 高くつくよ

translation.en: And I think that guy's tab has run out.
translation.ja: 彼のツケは もう利かない

translation.en: That's very cool.
translation.ja: それ クールね

translation.en: [Afro] Oi-shi… Refreshing…
translation.ja: オイシイ…　爽快だ

translation.en: Good, you'll need it.
translation.ja: 元気 出た？

translation.en: You've still got a long way to go, No.2.
translation.ja: 道のりは まだ長いわよ ナンバー２

translation.en: Cross the mountains by way of the "Low Down East" path. Beware of the cliffs, and know that their waiting for you.
translation.ja: “東への道”で行きな 崖の先で奴らが待ってる

translation.en: [Afro] Thanks.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: [Ninja-Ninja] Hey Afro! Yo, Fro-boy.
translation.ja: おい アフロ！

translation.en: Your sure this is the right way to go? These cliffs don't look so safe man.
translation.ja: この道でいいのかよ すげぇ崖だぞ

translation.en: And one other thing.
translation.ja: オマケに…

translation.en: Uh… Don't look now but I think you got a stalker.
translation.ja: さっきの店から つけてる奴がいる

translation.en: A crazy fan boy from the tea house and he don't want your autograph, more like your epitaph.
translation.ja: サインじゃなくて お前の墓碑銘が欲しいようだな

translation.en: Now, I suggest you keep stepin' cause this one… …is a stone killer, for real.
translation.ja: さっさと町まで行こうぜ グズグズしてたら殺される

translation.en: Yo, didn't you hear me? Get going!
translation.ja: 何だよ　止まるなよ

translation.en: I'm trying to pull your coat.
translation.ja: 早く行けって

translation.en: All you gonna do is ignore me? Alright, alright, you wanna blow it for me and you, huh?
translation.ja: そんなに俺と２人 仲よく死にてえのか？

translation.en: [Afro] Shut up…
translation.ja: 黙れ

translation.en: Well fine, go on, get your lanky ass killed then. But don't say I didn't warn ya!
translation.ja: なら勝手に死ね 忠告はしたからな

translation.en: Later!
translation.ja: あばよ

translation.en: [Shosun] I am called Shosun. I come from the land of the great weapon masters of the west.
translation.ja: 私は宗俊　西の武器使いの 地からやって来た

translation.en: I see you wear one of the head bands of legend that leads to godhood.
translation.ja: それが神に近づく 伝説のハチマキだな

translation.en: So, shall we?
translation.ja: 早速だが 始めようか

translation.en: Afro, don't fight this fucker.
translation.ja: そいつとは やるな！

translation.en: He got arrows and grenades and shit. You ain't got no chance dude!
translation.ja: 矢だの グレネードだの 持ってやがるぞ

translation.en: Agh! Is you dead? Don't tell me you dead! Is you dead? I asked you a question!
translation.ja: おい 死んじまったのか？ 何とか言えよ

translation.en: Your jumping has only put you directly in the line of my fire, samurai fool!
translation.ja: ジャンプすれば 私の射程圏内に入るだけだ

translation.en: Where will you go now, great No.2 warrior?
translation.ja: さあ どこへ逃げる？ ナンバー２

translation.en: My aim is only to move forward.
translation.ja: 俺は前にしか進まない

translation.en: [Ninja-Ninja] Whoa! Brother you did your thang!
translation.ja: やるねえ　シビれたぜ！

translation.en: I thought you was dead for sure!
translation.ja: 死んだかと思った

translation.en: Yo, my man, I… I gots to tell ya, I don't know if it's your natural pheromones or you need a shower,
translation.ja: たまには風呂入って ニオイを落とせよ

translation.en: but assassins are com'in to us like flies on hot shit.
translation.ja: お前のフェロモンに “殺し屋(ハエ)”が集まってくる

translation.en: I gots to say, there's something strange still out there.
translation.ja: 油断するなよ まだイヤな予感がする

translation.en: [Brother 1] Hm… Yes…
translation.ja: もしもし

translation.en: [Brother 2] It's me! Brother 2.
translation.ja: わしじゃ “弐の字”じゃ

translation.en: [Brother 1] Yes… uh-huh, I see… Carry on then.
translation.ja: なるほどな　分かった 思ったより 簡単ではないようじゃな

translation.en: And remember you are among the righteous few
translation.ja: 思ったより 簡単ではないようじゃな

translation.en: and we have placed great faith in your ability to track him.
translation.ja: このまま尾行を続けろ

translation.en: Because the No.2 warrior has now begun to move in earnest,
translation.ja: ナンバー２が 動き出したらしい

translation.en: it seems our cherished brother's work is now truly beginning.
translation.ja: 我らの仕事も 始まったようじゃ

translation.en: The No.2 walks the path Low Down East…
translation.ja: 奴が進むのは東への道

translation.en: [Brother 1] In the great ancestral direction…
translation.ja: 偉大なる先祖の方角だ

translation.en: Our No.2 warrior's journey will no doubt end at the great valley before the high slopes of Mt. Shumi.
translation.ja: 奴は この須弥山を目指し まずは谷から入ってくるはず

translation.en: We're getting almost all the data we need.
translation.ja: データは揃いつつある

translation.en: The mandate of heaven has spoken and agreed with us,
translation.ja: 天命は我らに 味方しているのだ

translation.en: the righteous, the EMPTY SEVEN!
translation.ja: この“無無坊主(ノンノンボウズ)”に

translation.en: Wash over us, the supreme power!
translation.ja: 至高の力が 満ち溢れんことを！

translation.en: Let us pay homage to the Holy Way.
translation.ja: 聖なる道に祈りを捧げるのだ

translation.en: [Brother 1] Let us close our eyes and feel the power.
translation.ja: 目を閉じ パワーを感じるのだ

translation.en: Let the Divine roll within you.
translation.ja: 神聖な力を内に入れ—

translation.en: Let the Holy Way call you.
translation.ja: 聖なる道に導かれん

translation.en: As the Divine Will has ordained, we have risen from the ashes.
translation.ja: 天の意思が定めたように 我々は灰から生き返った

translation.en: …from this condition of oppression,
translation.ja: この逆境から 我々は十字架を背負った

translation.en: we have borne the cross, but we will seize the crown…
translation.ja: この逆境から 我々は十字架を背負った だが今こそ王冠を つかみ取るとき

translation.en: and the prophecy shall be fulfilled eye for an eye
translation.ja: 予言が現実となるのだ “目には目を”！

translation.en: No.2 shall know no mercy at the hands of the EMPTY SEVEN!
translation.ja: 我々 無無坊主によって ナンバー２は地獄を見るだろう

translation.en: Prepare for the final struggle.
translation.ja: いざ 最後の闘争に備えよ

translation.en: Freedom is in our reach.
translation.ja: 自由は すぐそこにある

translation.en: The supreme power of God shall be ours!
translation.ja: 並ぶものなき神の力が 我らの物となるのだ！

translation.en: Amen! Have you heard, my brothers? [Brothers] Yes!
translation.ja: 兄弟たちよ　聞こえたか？

translation.en: [Brother 1] Do you hear the word?
translation.ja: 導きのままに

translation.en: [Ninja-Ninja] Man, all these kill'ins are really starting to depress me.
translation.ja: 殺しばかり見せられて 気が滅入るぜ

translation.en: You know what I mean Afro?
translation.ja: 聞いてんの？

translation.en: Oh, mo' cold shoulder, uh?
translation.ja: また無視かよ

translation.en: [Ninja-Ninja] Yo, Holmes, you're walk'in a little funny.
translation.ja: お前 ふらふらしてるぞ

translation.en: What's up? Whoa, wassup?
translation.ja: お前 ふらふらしてるぞ どうした！

translation.en: Was it something in the lemonade?
translation.ja: レモネードのせいか？

translation.en: Oh, snap, you fucked up Holmes!
translation.ja: ケガしてるじゃねえか

translation.en: Oh look, oh shit, it was those damn arrows!
translation.ja: さっきの矢でやられたのか

translation.en: Come on, Afro, snap out of it man! Snap out of it!
translation.ja: アフロ　しっかりしろ

translation.en: [Brother 6] He's injured, I can take him.
translation.ja: 今なら倒せる

translation.en: Hey, hey! Wait! Wait! It's too early!
translation.ja: おい待て　まだ早い！

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, can't you give a brother a break, yo?
translation.ja: 少しはブラザーを 休ませてやれよ

translation.en: Can't you see the man is down? What about honor and fairness and shit?
translation.ja: 仁義とかフェアプレー精神は ないわけ？

translation.en: Hey, that a motherfuckin' RPG?
translation.ja: それ ＲＰＧじゃねえか！

translation.en: You got a motherfuckin' RPG? A RPG in a motherfuckin' backpack?
translation.ja: そんなもん背負って 歩いてんのかよ

translation.en: Wait, wait wait, can we talk about this?
translation.ja: なあ 話し合おうぜ

translation.en: You ain't got a monologue, you're not gonna give a bad guy speech?
translation.ja: お決まりの口上とかないの？

translation.en: Oh my god. Oh my god, oh my god…
translation.ja: ちょっと待てよ　ウソだろ？

translation.en: [Brother 2] That fool!
translation.ja: バカめ

translation.en: He may have destroyed the sacred No.2 headband as well!
translation.ja: 二番のハチマキまで 吹き飛ばす気か！
